node.title: Aboriginal death in custody casts pall over new correctional facility launch
node.alt: A two storey jail wing, showing stairs leading to the second level of cells.
node.description: The opening of a new prison wing at Cessnock Correctional Centre, in the NSW Hunter Valley, has been marred by the death of a 26-year-old Indigenous inmate.
node.content:
["Corrective Services NSW top officers and a brass band rolled out the fanfare on Monday for a ceremonial opening of Cessnock Correctional Centre's newest minimum-security wing.", "But an Aboriginal death in custody just the day before at the\u00a0nearby Shortland correctional unit cast\u00a0a sombre note over the unveiling of the 240-bed facility, attended by scores of dignitaries.", "Prison chaplain Reverend Di Langham said the death of the 26-year-old man on Sunday would be a heavy loss for the community.", "\"It is with a heavy heart that I share with you that yesterday I was called into Shortland to another Aboriginal death in custody,\" Reverend Langham said.", "", "
Reverend Di Langham is an Anglican priest and chaplain at Cessnock Correctional Centre.(ABC Newcastle: Anthony Scully)
", "\"A 26-year-old man, another of our young men, has taken his own life.\u00a0", "Reverend Langham, a Boandik/Barkindji woman, welcomed the Minister for Corrections Anthony Roberts to the prison, but urged those present to consider the importance of the jail's Indigenous inmates.", "\"I would like to remind everyone here, as I remind the Aboriginal men in this centre, that these men are our future elders,\" Reverend Langham said.\u00a0", "\"Whatever they have done and however they have been treated, the way they respond to their time in here, will be the way our future elders,\u00a0will be moulded.\"", "", "
Minister for Corrections Anthony Roberts at the launch of the\u00a0new wing.(ABC Newcastle: Anthony Scully)
", "\"We all know that Aboriginal people only make up 2 per cent\u00a0of the population on the outside. But in corrections, we make up nearly 38 per cent\u00a0of the men and much higher numbers in women.\u00a0", "The 26-year-old man who died on Sunday was found unresponsive in his cell just before 7:00am.\u00a0", "Mr\u00a0Roberts declined to comment on the man's death.", "Corrective Services and NSW Police are investigating the incident and a report will\u00a0be prepared for the coroner.", "At the time of publication data showed there were 481 First Nations deaths in custody since the royal commission findings were released in 1991.", "Last month, Corrective Services NSW said it had launched a review into Aboriginal deaths in custody over the past decade.", "", "
Acting Governor of Cessnock\u00a0Correctional Facility Dale Ashcroft, Minister for Counter Terrorism and Corrections Anthony Roberts and Corrective Services NSW Acting Commissioner Kevin Corcoran PMS inspect a new cell.(ABC Newcastle: Anthony Scully)
", "
Training for a law-abiding life
", "Mr Roberts said the new 240-bed unit, in operation through the COVID-19 lockdown, had a focus on employment and training\u00a0to help inmates prepare for a law-abiding life outside prison.", "\"We provide\u00a0a number of opportunities in getting tickets from TAFE,\" Mr Roberts said.\u00a0", "\"We work closely with businesses to ensure\u00a0inmates are getting those certificates that are sought after, when they leave prison, to make sure that they've got a better chance of getting a job and reintegrating into the community.\"", "", "
A prisoner works at a sewing machine\u00a0in the\u00a0new wing.(ABC Newcastle: Anthony Scully)
", "An inmate at the facility, Nick, said the textiles work\u00a0was rewarding.", "\"It is compared to sitting in a cell and doing nothing,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"You feel like you've sort of achieved something and it helps the weeks pass.\""]
